titles.title: Accelerated Payments for Small Businesses Act of 2019
Accelerated Payments for Small Businesses Act of 2019
A bill to amend section 3903 of title 31, United States Code, to establish accelerated payments applicable to contracts with certain small business concerns, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Accelerated Payments for Small Businesses Act of 2019
This bill establishes a goal for federal agencies to pay small business invoices within 15 days of receiving a proper invoice if a specific payment date is not established by contract.
